title: find
description: Find an element based on display text or a selector, then optionally interact with it.

string.title: Find element (simple)
string.description: Display text or selector of the element to find.

elementText.description: Display text of the element to find. If combined with `selector`, the element must match both the text and the selector.

selector.description: Selector of the element to find. If combined with `elementText`, the element must match both the text and the selector.

timeout.description: Max duration in milliseconds to wait for the element to exist.

moveTo.description: Move to the element. If the element isn't visible, it's scrolled into view.

type.description: Type keys after finding the element. Either a string or an object with a `keys` field as defined in [`type`](type). To type in the element, make the element active with the `click` parameter.
